description: Number of unlabeled bicolored graphs on 2n nodes having n nodes of each color and allowing the color classes to be interchanged.
references: F. Harary, L. March and R. W. Robinson, On enumerating certain design problems in terms of bicolored graphs with no isolates, Environment and Planning, B 5 (1978), 31-43.
R. W. Robinson, Numerical implementation of graph counting algorithms, AGRC Grant, Math. Dept., Univ. Newcastle, Australia, 1976.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 14 2007
